xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/969521-A Different Kind of Black Man 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6uiD9T8cm1dnQuCxgEW6CAILF9u.jpg This short documentary takes a look at the ideas and feelings of successful, black gay men on such issues as sexuality and masculinity, as well as their perception of, and their role within, the black community. A Different Kind of Black Man
